articles.title: See Elon Musk's unusual tweets after becoming largest Twitter shareholder

articles.title: What else could Elon Musk buy for $43 billion?
articles.description: After Elon Musk, the world’s wealthiest man, offered to take Twitter private for roughly $43 billion, The Verge staff wondered what else he could buy with that kind of cash.
